DataElement.preferredName: Dental   Fix  Device Wire  Upper Oral Cavity Present  Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Whether the participant has a fixed wire which is bonded to the upper part of the mouth

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental   Fix  Device Wire  Upper Oral Cavity Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The participant's fixed wire which is bonded to the upper part of the mouth

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Cause to be firmly attached; stick or hold together and resist separation.:A metal strand designed for signal or power transmission or for structural or other purpose.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Cause to be firmly attached; stick or hold together and resist separation.
A metal strand designed for signal or power transmission or for structural or other purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: Higher in place or position; the topmost one of two.:The cavity lying at the upper end of the alimentary canal, bounded on the outside by the lips and inside by the oropharynx and containing in humans the tongue, gums, and teeth.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Higher in place or position; the topmost one of two.
The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
